titles.title: Self-Insured Workers' Compensation Funds Tax Exempt Status Clarification Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax exempt treatment of self-insured workers' compensation funds.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/10/1987--Introduced. Self-Insured Workers' Compensation Funds Tax Exempt Status Clarification Act of 1987 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide tax-exempt status to any corporation, fund, or trust whose principal purpose is to function as a self-insured workers' compensation or workers' disability fund.
